name: Syncplay Mobile
subtitle: Watch videos in sync with your friends.
description: nofficial Syncplay client app for Android and iOS. Watch stuff in sync with your friends. Works well with Syncplay on PC. Fully written in Kotlin and Compose multiplatform.

apps.name: Syncplay Mobile
apps.subtitle: Watch videos with friends in sync.
apps.localizedDescription: Unofficial Syncplay client app for Android and iOS. Watch stuff in sync with your friends. Works well with Syncplay on PC. Fully written in Kotlin and Compose multiplatform.
